description: This two-part scene marks a milestone in Club Inferno Exclusive Evan Matthews' career. Our resident fist's wildest fantasy comes true when he is paired with his 'fisting idol,' Matthieu Paris. Matthews credits his desire to develop his fisting skills to Paris and the sexual energy between the pair sizzles! Matthews worships every inch of Paris with his tongue while fellow fister Mason Garet works over Matthews' hole. Soon a fisting train begins when Garet invades Matthews' rosebud while Matthews works his greasy paw inside Paris' ass. The men switch it up, putting Garet in the middle to sit down on Paris' fist while he continues to work over his buddy Matthews.
title: Handy Men, Scene #04
